heroSection.title: GeoGuesser
heroSection.subtitle: 🌍 Explore the World Through Geographic Challenges
heroSection.body: Put your geographic knowledge to the test in the most thrilling online game! Guess locations from around the globe using Street View and score points based on your accuracy.

demoSection.title: 🎯 How does it work?
demoSection.body: Simple rules, endless fun! Here's how to play GeoGuesser

demo.instructionStep1: You'll be dropped in a random location around the world
demo.instructionStep2: Use Street View to look around and find clues
demo.instructionStep3: Click on the map where you think you are
demo.instructionStep4: The closer to the actual location, the more points you earn!

gamesSection.title: 🎮 Games
gamesSection.body: Exciting challenges tailored to every skill level

playSection.title: Ready for an adventure? 🚀
playSection.subtitle: Join millions of players discovering the world through GeoGuesser. Start your geographic adventure today - completely free!
